tool_description: An API showing all the latest news related to crypto and bitcoin market from the most popular websites such as coindesk etc
name: Crypto Market News
title: Crypto Market News

api_list.name: GET Crypto News of specific News site
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all the Crypto News of specific News site
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-market-news.p.rapidapi.com/crypto/bitcoin"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-market-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-market-news.p.rapidapi.com/crypto/{cryptoid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-market-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
